thread.title: Sarah Quirk Was Daulby
thread.title_full: tails.com reviewed by Sarah Quirk Was Daulby

author: Sarah Quirk Was Daulby
title: Sarah Quirk Was Daulby
text: We've been using Tails.com now for a few months for our puppy Bella.. we had tried so many of the other brands which upset her tummy or she didn't eat it .. she loves her food now both the dry and wet varieties .. no longer do we have food hanging around for hours it's gone in seconds.. we love that it's all healthy for her without lots of additives and the fact it turns up every month on time with no problems is just perfect .. we would definitely recommend
